summary: This cable discusses Benito Ruiz Suarez, his background, connections, and travel habits. It requests traces and POA on him, noting his DOB, wife's name, and former role as a manager at the Hotel Nacional in Havana. He is identified as a former agent and sole Cuban delegate to the ACTA convention.
title: REQUEST TRACES AND POA BENITO RUIZ SUAREZ
recipient: DOP, ADDP, C/CI, C/SAS 5, FF VR
